p: Multi-species kits were purchased from ID.VET Company (ID.VET Diagnostics—France); ID Screen ® Brucellosis Serum Indirect kit, ID Screen ® C. abortus Indirect Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA) kit, ID Screen ® Rift Valley fever Competitive Elisa kit and ID Screen ® FMDV Type O Competitive Elisa kit, following the manufacturer instructions. The optical density was measured at 450 nm with an automated ELISA reader (SIRIOS Elisa Reader, Indonesia).
